website_summaries.verdict: This top-quality hammock tent provides supreme comfort and build for those willing to spend some extra cash.
pros: Hammock lies flat for comfortable sleeping
Includes a bug net and rain fly
Setup takes only a few minutes
Can also be used on the ground
cons: Difficult to find sleeping mat to fit inside this wider tent

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent - Fantastic Service
customer_reviews.text: First let me say I had used my old hammock ten for many years and liked it a lot, but this tent is so much more comfortable. It has a nice stable platform; in that it allows you to lay almost flat. So I have used the tent and loved it. But...I messed up and damaged it. I contacted the seller explaining what I had done wrong with it and the damaged I had caused; so they could let me know how I could get it repaired, they simply sent me a replacement. This is almost too kind as it was my fault and no issue with the tent. So, Kudos to “Getoutland”!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: it is everything they say
customer_reviews.text: had no serious issues with this tent. it is comfortable and sturdy. the only thing is how to fit it into a weight budget scenario for lightweight backpacking. it is somewhat on the heavy side in this sense. like everyone has said, the pole design needs a lighter solution. but, definitely this is a great product and it is surprising that lawson is the only guy to figure it out. no one has copied it really either.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Brown

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product and Customer service
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is so comfortable and easy to set up. I am a tall person and on a three day camping trip this hammock is the real deal. It doesn't sag much and is quite stable! With the Lawson brand straps and carabiners set up is a breeze. I opened the product for the first time and was all set and ready to go in 3 minutes tops. To top it all of customer service is knowledgeable and helpful. Great product & Great company cant go wrong with Lawson Blue Ridge Hammock. I am a lifetime customer!
customer_reviews.author: BE

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hammock so there will always be a bit of a “bend” in your sleep posture.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I’d hang it in my backyard and sleep in it every night if I could. Combined with my Mega insulated air mattress it’s almost as good a night’s sleep as my $2k mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable hammock hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing hammock got a flat lay which I haven’t been able to get in a regular hammock. Very easy set up and take down. It’s amazing to be able to look up at the stars as you fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for any person who loves the outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: This was on my wishlist for awhile and it exceeded my expectations. The structure is great, it's easy to assemble, and the material is awesome. I've already taken it on a few trips and it's such a great experience. I HIGHLY recommend this hammock for anyone who loves camping or is looking to do some solo trips. Did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Dayle

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking I would need it, and am going to return it, only because I do not need it at this time. However, I set it up and found it to be amazingly comfortable and well made. I’m 5’11” and it was a nice fit and really spacious on the inside. Hands down, if I decided I want to get a tent/hammock this fall/winter, I will definitely consider remaking this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Smith

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my son - after camping my other son now wants one. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Can be used as a tent or hammock
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable hammock with insect netting and a rain fly. Makes a versatile light weight backpacking shelter
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Downey

customer_reviews.title: Metal poles to connect are cheap quality. Wasted my money. Now I need money back
customer_reviews.text: Ued only 2 times and a metal piece broke . Slept on the ground. Sux
customer_reviews.author: Tatyana

customer_reviews.title: ... is my 4th year with this hammock tent in beautiful Crestone CO
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th year with this hammock tent in beautiful Crestone CO, I love it. I usually hang it high and taught using coma-longs and securing corners so it doesn't flip. Falling asleep watching a full moon slowly drift across the sky, the luminous stars or the beautiful mountains while listening to the creek below, this tent and the right place to hang it, can improve your perspective on life, the universe, and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fisher

customer_reviews.title: The cure for tipping
customer_reviews.text: Get yourself some small tent pegs and light rope - Put out guy wires from the hammock corners and peg them down - no more tipping
customer_reviews.author: shamus100

product_meta.title: Lawson Hammock Forest Green Hammock & Strap Bundle Blue Ridge Strap Tent Hammock Camping
product_meta.description: Style:Hammock and Strap BundleLawson Blue Ridge Camping Hammock and Strap Set A unique, hybrid tent-hammock that has been rated #1 on the market by leading publications like Backpacker and Outside. The patented design allows for use suspended, as a hammock, or on the ground, as a tent, greatly increasing camping terrain options that are often limited by the type of shelter you’re using. The spreader bar and arch pole system also keep the bed of the hammock flatter and more taut, eliminating much of the uncomfortable “cocoon” and “banana” effect created by most hammocks. The Blue Ridge Camping Hammock has attached no-see-um bug netting and a rainfly that attaches directly to the hammock, so no need for additional trees for tying off a tarp or staking. Lightweight, easy to set up and perfect for all types of camping or anyone looking for a comfortable, bug/water proof place to relax or sleep. Specifications: Total Weight: 4. 93 lbs. (including poles, rain fly, straps, and stuff sacks) Interior Length: 90 in. Interior Width: 42 in. Pack Size: 22in x 6 in. Weight Limit: 275 lbs. Construction: Hammock body made of rip stop-nylon and poly pack cloth. No-see-um net canopy keeps bugs out. Waterproof nylon border on the canopy protects against water blowing up under rain fly. Waterproof rip stop-nylon rain fly included. Non-stretch Polyester Webbing Additional Features: Two interior storage pockets. O-ring in ceiling for hanging light. Stuff sack included. Use suspended or on the ground. Patent Pending Buckle System more reliable than traditional "daisy-chain" straps" Easily adjusts using attached high-strength buckles. Much more precise than common “daisy-chain” straps. Comes with everything you need to hang your hammock.
feature_bullets: Hybrid ground tent or hammock: can be used as a single or double ground tent, or a suspended hammock.

Ideal use: Perfect for all types of camping including car camping, backpacking, scouting, kayaking, canoeing, mountaineering, or jungle camping. Quick and easy setup only takes a few minutes. Suspend the hammock from Two trees or any sturdy object. No trees in sight, set-up as a ground tent.
Portable: with a compact pack size of 22 x 6” and pack weight of 4. 25 lbs This hybrid bivy and hammock is the perfect lightweight Shelter for all adventures.

Comfort: Lawson's patented design uses arch poles and spreader bars to keep the hammock bed flat, thus eliminating much of the cocoon effect created by standard parachute hammocks. With a roomy 90 x 42” interior and 275 weight capacity there is plenty of room to spread out.
Included: Lawson blue Ridge hammock/ ground tent Hybrid, detachable waterproof rain fly, integrated mosquito and bug net, stuff sack, spreader bars, and *hammock straps (*bundle only)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars24 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
